## DataPatch type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DataPatch<TRow = any, TRowId = RowId> = {
    type: "replaceAll";
    rows: TRow[];
} | {
    type: "append";
    row: TRow;
} | {
    type: "update";
    row: TRow;
} | {
    type: "remove";
    id: TRowId;
};
```
**References:** [RowId](./list-display.rowid.md)
